subtitle: Planned improvements and architectural enhancements for a real-world, large-scale deployment.

data.description: Add transactional email notifications for key user actions such as order confirmation, payment status updates, and password resets, along with automated invoice generation for completed orders.
Move non-critical tasks such as email notifications, invoice generation, and webhook callbacks to background jobs to improve API responsiveness and reliability.
Introduce Redis to cache frequently accessed data such as product catalogs and configuration to reduce database load and improve response times.
Use a message queue to decouple order creation, payment confirmation, and inventory updates, improving fault tolerance and scalability.
Integrate with third-party shipping services to enable real-time shipment tracking and delivery status updates for customers.
Add structured logging, metrics, and tracing to gain better visibility into system behavior and simplify debugging in production.
Record audit logs for critical actions such as stock adjustments, order cancellations, and admin changes to ensure traceability.
